mintByRole(address,uint256,string[]).details: Mint new tokens for single address with dedicated tokenURIs.

mintByRole(address[],string[]).details: Mint new tokens for multiple addresses with dedicated tokenURIs.

mintByRole(address[],uint256).details: Mint constant amount of new tokens for multiple addresses (e.g. 1 nft for each address).

mintByRole(address[],uint256[]).details: Mints multiple `amount`s of new tokens for every single address in `tos`.

devdoc.title: ERC721 - Mint as role - with meta-transactions

userdoc.notice: Allow minting for senders with MINTER_ROLE to mint new tokens with meta-transactions supported via ERC2771 (supports ERC721A).
